DeploymentName.description: Identifier for this deployment. No spaces allowed in name.
DeploymentName.title: Deployment Name

lambdaNamePrefix.description: The prefix to be used for names of the generated lambdas for the API endpoints.
lambdaNamePrefix.title: Lambda Name Prefix

APIDomain.description: The domain name that the API should be deployed to (e.g. api.mysite.com)
APIDomain.title: API Domain

HostedZoneDomain.description: The domain name of the Route 53 hosted zone that the domain for this API should be added to.
HostedZoneDomain.title: Hosted Zone Domain

CorsHeader.description: Optional URL for an UI that should be allowed to access this server.
CorsHeader.title: CORS Header

TerraformVariables.description: Define which of the deployment variables will be made available for terraform.
TerraformVariables.title: Terraform Variables

TerraformVariable.description: Name of the property that should be converted into a Terraform variable.
TerraformVariable.title: Terraform Variable

TerraformStateKey.description:
Key used for Terraform state persisted in Terraform state bucket.

Will be auto-generated upon first deployment if not provided.
TerraformStateKey.title: Terraform State Key

TerraformVersion.description:
Version of Terraform that the remote state for this deployment was created with.

Go to the next version using `yarn infra upgrade [deploymentName] [targetVersion]`. Note that Terraform versions should only be increased one at a time, so for instance you can go from v0.12 to v0.13 but not from v0.12 to v0.14.

AWSDeploymentRegion.description: AWS region that infrastructure should be deployed to.
AWSDeploymentRegion.title: AWS Deployment Region

AWSUserName.description: Name of the AWS user that is used to perform the deployment.
AWSUserName.title: AWS User Name
